page.title: 06 FARMING:EMPLOYMENT ETC.
page.content: Most farms are owned or rented by a family and so that family farms them. Some,however,employ workers,usually from this area and are not farmed by the farm owners.Many youths are recruited on a Youth Training Scheme and afterwards stay on at that particular farm as a labourer.During harvesting,especially if there is poor weather forecasted,the labourers may work from daylight to daybreak i.e.at least 14 hours a day and usually at the weekend if necessary to get the crops in in time. Winter and summer barley provide a year round crop.As the name suggests the winter barley is harvested in the late winter months and the summer barley in the summer.
